scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace api dev" "yarn workspace ui dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "yarn workspace api build" "yarn workspace ui build"
scripts.start: concurrently "yarn workspace api start" "yarn workspace ui preview"
scripts.clean: concurrently "yarn workspace api clean" "yarn workspace ui clean"
scripts.docker:clean-run: docker rm -f s3explorerV0 && docker run -d --name s3explorerV0 -p 8000:8000 -p 3000:3000 s3explorer:latest
